title: Four-star to visit UGA soon
text:
Four-star to visit UGA soon After receiving an offer from Georgia, this four-star plans to visit the Bulldogs soon.   Top Miami safety target Gurvan Hall flashed The U on Sunday. (Photo: Andrew Ivins, 247Sports) 
DAVENPORT, Fla. - After receiving an offer from Georgia last week, four-star safety Gurvan Hall (West Palm Beach, Fla./Palm Beach Lakes) plans to visit the Bulldogs later this spring, possibly in March. Not a member? Try a seven-day FREE trial to VIP access to Dawgs247! 
"I have been talking to Coach Coley," Hall told 247Sports National Insider Ryan Bartow. "He has been trying to get at me since January last year. Then all of a sudden, he just hit me up with the news about the offer. Georgia is a great fit for me. I watched a lot of their DB's and they get after it." 
(What's next for the Bulldogs? Make sure you're in the loop -- take a few moments to sign up for our FREE Bulldogs Newsletter! ) 
Florida State will also get the 6-foot-1, 185-pound prospect on campus this spring. All 16 Crystal Ball predictions are in favor of Miami landing Hall's commitment. A decision is expected heading into this summer. Author
